definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: The example perfects further for the non-support cable hoisting system in our country.
sentences.chinese: 該橋是對我國無支架纜索吊裝系統的進一步完善。

sentences.english: Put the eye of the towing line on the bitts.
sentences.chinese: 把拖纜索眼套在繫纜樁上。

sentences.english: That sailor told me to pay away the rope immediately.
sentences.chinese: 那個海員叫我把纜索馬上放下。

sentences.english: The ship parted her hawsers in the gale.
The anchorage design of cable-crane is applied extensively in bridge construction.
sentences.chinese: 纜索吊機錨碇設計在橋樑施工中應用十分廣泛。

sentences.english: Watch the propulsion ram and the attached rope pulley in action as the car ascends.
sentences.chinese: 留意當機艙上升時，驅動臂及附載的纜索滑輪的移動。

sentences.english: A ride on the Chaumont funicular affords panoramic views.
sentences.chinese: 坐上肖蒙纜索遊客們可以觀賞到全景。

sentences.english: And they must learn to control the various vibrations that arise in electrodynamic tether systems.
sentences.chinese: 他們也必須學習控制電動纜索系統出現的各類震動。

sentences.english: The crew bowsed the ropes down before the storm came.
sentences.chinese: 船員們在風暴來臨之前把纜索繫緊。

sentences.english: So the soldiers cut the ropes of the dinghy and set it adrift.
sentences.chinese: 那時，士兵便割斷小艇的纜索，任它沉沒。

sentences.english: Engineering drawings are fundamental to CAD and CAM.
sentences.chinese: 工程圖紙是索網式纜索起重機機械生產的基礎。

sentences.english: Cable automatic climbing was the key problem of the maintenance robotization for in-service cables.
sentences.chinese: 纜索自動爬升是在役纜索維護機器人化的最關鍵問題。

sentences.english: Cable automatic climbing was the key problem of the maintenance robotization for in-service cables.
sentences.chinese: 纜索自動爬升是在役纜索維護機器人化的最關鍵問題。

sentences.english: A supporting network of aircraft cable can be used if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 必要對，可以使用飛機纜索的支承網。

sentences.english: And mooring cables would thrum in the currents, like a guitar string.
sentences.chinese: 固定用的纜索，像吉他弦一樣，在水流中會振盪出聲。

sentences.english: A conveyance for passengers or freight on a cable railway.
sentences.chinese: 攀登陡坡的纜索鐵路上運送乘客和貨物的運輸工具。
